title: Roasted asparagus with caramelised shallot dressing
ingredients: ['500 g (1 lb 2 oz) asparagus, trimmed', '4 teaspoons olive oil', '6 large cloves garlic', '4 shallots', '3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', 'salt and black pepper', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme, sage and rosemary mixed, or all thyme']
